paper_metadata.title: Agricultural Landscape Externalities and Rural Poverty in Morocco's Western High Atlas Mountains

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The economic benefits are evaluated in relation to income, employment, investment, and welfare of local population and their contribution to rural poverty reduction
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Of 134 farms studied, the attributes of agricultural landscape externalities are identified and characterized

evidence_citations.country_citation: This chapter presents an empirical analysis of agricultural landscape externalities and an economic valuation of their potential impacts to reduce rural poverty in Morocco's Western High Atlas Mountains
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Of 134 farms studied, the attributes of agricultural landscape externalities are identified and characterized
